subject: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2120
description_text: Hello, I noticed that you purchased both the Plus X upgrade kit and the Pro X Ultra master control box, which are accessories for two different models of pedals. Please let us know which pedal you are currently using so that we can ship the correct items to you.

conversations.body_text:
Iâ€™m actually not running Simsonn peddles but I will be able to use the motors with my set up. I purchased the control box because I was under impression it was needed for the VAM motors to work.  I picked up the upgrade kit because those parts are also compatible. If my thinking is off, please let me know, but I really appreciate you reaching out. 

Chris Powell

Sent from my iPhone

>
